issue.title: [CI] Upgrade checkout GitHub actions to the latest versions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16569](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16569). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We are currently using old versions for the following github actions:
```java

actions/checkout@v2
```
There has been new versions for those released:

<https://github.com/actions/checkout>

We probably should update them.
